directorsTeam.text1Back: His master on Electronic and Telecommunications from CICESE, Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico and his Ph.D. on ́Telecommunications and Electronics from SEPI, Instituto Politenico Nacional.
directorsTeam.name: Ph.D. Rogelio Bustamante Bello

directorsTeam.text1Back: Ph.D. on Mechanics from Budapest University of Technology and Economy, Ph.D. degree on Manufacturing Systems from Loughborough University, United Kingdom. He is Vice-President of Research at the Tecnologico ́de Monterrey.
directorsTeam.name: Ph.D. Arturo Molina

directorsTeam.text1Back: His master debree from Tecnologico de Monterrey, Monterrey and his Ph.D. from The Grenoble Institute of Technology, France.
directorsTeam.name: Ph.D. Ricardo A. Ramirez

collaboratorsTeam.text1Back: On 2012, he worked as Subdirector in risk methodologies in Comisió Nacional Bancaria y de Valores. Later, from 2012 to 2014 he was director of software development in División Científica de la Policia Federal (now part of Secretaría de Gobernación).
collaboratorsTeam.name: Ph.D. Gerardo Carrera

collaboratorsTeam.text1Back: Post PhD in autonomous vehicles in the Berlin Public University with PhD. Doctor Raul Rojas Gonzales and experience as an associate investigator in Neuroscience and Brain-Computer interfaces in the Berlin Medical Charité University. Now a days he is a permanent teacher-investigator at the Salle University, Benjamin Franklin Campus.
collaboratorsTeam.name: Ph.D. Adalberto Hernández Llarena

collaboratorsTeam.text1Back: He completed a Master of Science in Engineering in Microelectronics, graduating with honors and a Doctorate in Communications and Electronics from the National Polytechnic in 2013 and 2017 respectively.
collaboratorsTeam.name: Ph.D. David Navarro

collaboratorsTeam.text1Back: He has participated in projects of product prototyping, automation, digital signal processing, haptic systems, human motion analysis and sensor fusion focused on inertial sensors and GNSS with applications in mobile robotics, medicine and virtual reality.
collaboratorsTeam.name: Msc. Israel Cayetano

collaboratorsTeam.text1Back: He has worked in the medical industry, as a researcher and teacher. He is currently a doctoral candidate and works in intelligent vehicles, machine learning, artificial intelligence, digital systems and embedded.
collaboratorsTeam.name: Msc. Rolando Bautista

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He has a Master's Degree in Engineering with a specialty in Quality Systems and Productivity from Tecnológico de Monterrey, which allows him to have a broad vision of the processes and operations of the companies and allows him to lead projects.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Msc. Gustavo S. Navas Reascos

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He is currently studying his master's degree at the School of Engineering and Sciences in the same university. His studies of interest are artificial intelligence, robotics and intelligent vehicles.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Ph.D. Javier Alberto de la Tejera de la Peña

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He is currently working as specialist engineering in the School of Engineering and Science in the same university.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Msc. Luis Alberto Curiel

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He is currently pursuing the Ph. D. degree in the School of Engineering and Science in Tecnolgico de Monterrey.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Ph.D. Javier Izquierdo

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: Now a day he is making his masters degree on Engineering Science. Among his interests are domotics, artificial intelligence and control systems.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Msc. Ariel Alejandro López Aguilar

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He is currently pursuing the Ph. D. degree in the School of Engineering and Science in the same university.
ProjectManagersTeam.name: Ph.D. Sergio Alberto Navarro Tuch

ProjectManagersTeam.text1Back: He has worked in the medical industry, as a researcher and teacher. He is currently a doctoral candidate and works in intelligent vehicles, machine learning, artificial intelligence, digital systems and embedded.
